TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RijndaelManagedTransform extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.Security.Cryptography.ICryptoTransform
Public NotInheritable Class RijndaelManagedTransform Implements ICryptoTransform
type RijndaelManagedTransform = class interface ICryptoTransform interface IDisposable

summary.span: 使用 Rijndael 算法执行数据的加密转换。

span.span: Performs a cryptographic transformation of data using the Rijndael algorithm.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 不建议使用此类。Using this class is not recommended. 更好的做法是将 与 对象结合使用。A better practice is to use with a object. 对象处理在直接使用 时可能发生的填充问题。The object handles the padding issues that can occur when using directly. 有关示例，请参见 类。For an example, see the class. 和 方法均返回 类的实例，该实例使用当前 对象的密钥信息进行初始化。Both the and methods return an instance of the class that is initialized with the key information of the current object. 若要使用 Rijndael 算法对数据进行加密或解密，请将这些方法返回的 对象传递到 对象。To encrypt or decrypt data using the Rijndael algorithm, pass the object returned by these methods to a object.

span.span: Cryptographic Services

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Clear() cil managed

summary.span: 释放 类使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是对 类的简单调用。This method is a simple call to class. 调用 `Dispose` 允许出于其他目的重新分配 所使用的资源。Calling `Dispose` allows the resources used by the to be reallocated for other purposes. 有关 `Dispose`的详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged)。For more information about `Dispose`, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged).

span.span: Cryptographic Services

abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放由 类的当前实例占用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 `Dispose` 后，应调用 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法使 处于不可用状态。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用 `Dispose`后，必须释放对 的所有引用，以便垃圾回收器可以回收 占用的内存。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged)和[实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 `Dispose` 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Reset() cil managed

summary.span: 重置 的内部状态，这样就可将它再次用来进行其他加密或解密。

span.span: Resets the internal state of so it can be used again to do a different encryption or decryption.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 时，会自动调用 方法。The method is called automatically when you call . 例如，当加密的输入数据是垃圾的并且无法解密时，不会调用 方法。The method is not called when, for example, the encrypted input data is garbage and cannot be decrypted. 在这种情况下，将引发异常，并且不会调用 。In this case, an exception is thrown and is not called. 在这种情况下，你可以选择手动调用 方法。You can choose to manually call the method in this case.
